attributes.action: make sanitary protection free for all females
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every month girls and women have to go through their periods. We, the undersigned, think it is unfair that we have to pay around £10 a month on sanitary protection (Tampax etc. ) when they are a necessary requirement. Condoms and other types of contraception are available to all on the NHS. We, the undersigned, think that forms of sanitary protection should also be available on the NHS.
